category.name: Rich Client

preference.name: GnChangeNoticeRevision_GnChangeRequestRevision_default_relation
preference.preference_description: Specifies the relation to be created when a Change Notice Revision is pasted under a Change Request Revision. The specified relation becomes the default relation created between a Change Notice Revision and the target Change Request Revision. Users can also set this preference for their environment using the Edit-Options-Change Management menu command. Valid Values: CMImplements
